solution_line_template: In the first three turns, Susan has moved {first_turn_move} + {second_turn_move} - {second_turn_penalty} + {third_turn_move} = <<{first_turn_move}+{second_turn_move}-{second_turn_penalty}+{third_turn_move}={total_moved_first_three_turns}>>{total_moved_first_three_turns} spaces.
Susan has {total_spaces_game} - {total_moved_first_three_turns} = <<{total_spaces_game}-{total_moved_first_three_turns}={remaining_spaces}>>{remaining_spaces} spaces to move to win the game.
